alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 28 at 9:04PM PDT until March 30 at 2:00AM PDT by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON WEDNESDAY TO 2 AM PDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...West winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Coachella Valley and San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...From noon Wednesday to 2 AM PDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...More localized winds Tuesday night into Wednesday morning, will become stronger and more widespread for Wednesday afternoon and early evening.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Diego County Deserts; San Gorgonio Pass Near Banning
